metadata.title: CVE-2022-43497 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in WordPress versions prior to 6.0.3allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script. Thedeveloper also provides new patched releases for all versions since 3.7.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
